survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with In-Office Digital Workspace Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with digital tools provided in office workspaces, focusing on usability, effectiveness, and overall impact on productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital workspace tools provided in your office?
